SEARCH
Package algorithms.compGeometry

Class PerimeterFinder2

java.lang.Object
algorithms.compGeometry.PerimeterFinder2
public class PerimeterFinder2 extends Object
class to hold some of the newer methods w.r.t. boundary point extractions. This class is deprecated. Use methods in PerimeterFinder3 instead.
Author:
nichole

  • Method Details

    • extractBorder

      public Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> extractBorder(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> contiguousPoints)
      This class is deprecated. Use methods in PerimeterFinder3 instead. finds the pixels with neighbors not in given point set, contiguousPoints. Note, the contiguous points fill out the shape for which the border is found.
      Parameters:
      contiguousPoints -
      Returns:

    • extractBorder2

      public void extractBorder2(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> contiguousPoints, Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> outputEmbedded, Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> outputBoundary)
      This class is deprecated. Use methods in PerimeterFinder3 instead. finds any gaps embedded in the contiguous points.
      Parameters:
      contiguousPoints -
      outputEmbedded - output variable
      outputBoundary - output variable

    • extractBorder2

      public void extractBorder2(gnu.trove.set.TIntSet contiguousPoints, gnu.trove.set.TIntSet outputEmbedded, gnu.trove.set.TIntSet outputBoundary, int imgWidth)
      This class is deprecated. Use methods in PerimeterFinder3 instead. finds any gaps embedded in the contiguous points. The runtime complexity is roughly O(N_contiguousPoints).
      Parameters:
      contiguousPoints -
      outputEmbedded - output variable
      outputBoundary - output variable

    • extractOuterBorder

      public Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> extractOuterBorder(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> contiguousPoints)
      This class is deprecated. Use methods in PerimeterFinder3 instead. finds the outer boundary points of the contiguous points. any embedded holes in the contiguousPoints are not included in the result boundary.
      Parameters:
      contiguousPoints -
      Returns:

    • thinTheBoundary

      public void thinTheBoundary(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> boundary, Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> removedPoints, Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> contiguousPoints)

    • extractOrderedBorder

      public algorithms.util.PairIntArray extractOrderedBorder(Set<algorithms.util.PairInt> contiguousPoints)
      This class is deprecated. Use methods in PerimeterFinder3 instead. NOT READY FOR USE...needs alot more testing. given a set of contiguous points, fills in embedded points and then extracts the outer boundary points, and then orders the outer boundary points. For best results, the contiguous points might need to be pre-processed to smooth the curve and in some cases, one might want to separate the region into more than one where the region is thin enough to prevent two pixel paths through it as needed by a spatially sequential closed curve. NOTE: it is up to the invoker to give the method a point set which is contiguous.
      Parameters:
      contiguousPoints -
      Returns:

    • extractOrderedBorder

      public algorithms.util.PairIntArray extractOrderedBorder(gnu.trove.set.TIntSet contiguousPoints, int imgWidth, int imgHeight) throws Exception
      NOT READY FOR USE...needs alot more testing. given a set of contiguous points, fills in embedded points and then extracts the outer boundary points, and then orders the outer boundary points. For best results, the contiguous points might need to be pre-processed to smooth the curve and in some cases, one might want to separate the region into more than one where the region is thin enough to prevent two pixel paths through it as needed by a spatially sequential closed curve. NOTE: it is up to the invoker to give the method a point set which is contiguous.
      Parameters:
      contiguousPoints -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      Exception
